title: The Sand Wars, Volume One: Solar Kill, Lasertown Blues and Celestial Hit List
description: Long out of print, The Sand Wars is Charles Ingrid 's classic saga of military science fiction. This special omnibus edition includes the first three books of the series-- Solar Kill, Lasertown Blues , and Celestial Hit List --together for the first time.Jack Storm was one of the last Knights--a soldier abandoned by his own people to fight a battle he couldn't possibly win. His only a suit of armor that has been altered by his alien enemies...armor that could, if worn too long, transform him into an inhuman killing machine.... But Jack Storm is not a machine. He is a man--on a one-man crusade of vengeance....
author: Charles Ingrid
